metadata.synopsis: This occurs after the player has agreed to do the penance. Abdirak is musing over which weapon to chose. The thrill of anticipation is in his voice - he can't wait to begin.

0.speaker: Abdirak
0.text: I think you would enjoy... yes, this is perfect.
0.context: NodeContext: As if perusing fruit at the market - excitement in his voice,

1.speaker: Abdirak
1.text: This was not your first choice, but you will love it - trust me.
1.context: NodeContext: The weapon the player chose wasn't available, so he's chosen another. Excitement in his voice as he readies himself for the beating.

2.speaker: Abdirak
2.text: I do believe you deserve something special. This is perfect.
2.context: NodeContext: Penance is about to begin. Excitement in his voice as he plans what to do to the player.

3.speaker: Abdirak
3.context: NodeContext: Has just chosen a weapon as if picking up some fruit from the market.
